price: Sen ve beraberindekiler, gemiye yerleşince: Bizi zalim kavimden kurtaran Allah’a hamdolsun, de!
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلۡفُلۡكِ فَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā is'tawayta anta waman maʿaka ʿalā al-ful'ki faquli al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī najjānā mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
